title: Do lower batch students of vibrant academy get ranks under 1000? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure you get good rank or under 1000. Vibrant Academy Kota is known for its Jee Advanced coaching. It has the best results as far as Jee Advanced is concerned. The faculties in the top 3-5 batches are one of the best in India. But the important point here is that it is highly focused on Jee Advanced and does not give much time to other entrances and board exams. But if you want to get a good rank in Jee advanced, go for Vibrant Kota.
